segments.text: Good afternoon , Ladies . May I help you ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Can we have two a joining double room , sir ?
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Have you made a reservation ladies ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: One moment , please . I have to check if there are room available . I ’ m sorry ladies . We have only two double room available , but they are on different floors . Would you mind that ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: We prefer they are on same floor because we have a problem check late that night .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: May I suggest family sweet ? You all just have a consolation .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: It ’ s a big room with a king - size double bed and two single beds . You ’ Ve get also an roller-wheels .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: That ’ s great . How much is it ?
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: 2000 Hongkong dollars per night plus ten percent service charge and five percent government tax .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: But , ladies , the room ’ s not yet ready . It will be delay about half an hour . Perhaps you can fill the registration form first . And rest at the lobby for a while . We ’ ll let you know when the room ‘ s ready .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Ladies , Hotel policy requires one nine of room charge as deposit .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Do you take traveller ’ s check ?
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Yes , we do , Madam . Thank you , madam . Here ’ s our welcome brochure with all of information of our facilities . My name is John . If you need any help do let me know . I ’ m at your service .
segments.speaker: S1
